requirements.name: Quality Education on Software Design Principles
requirements.description: The system shall support the educational objectives by providing examples of software design principles.

requirements.name: Quality Education on Software Analysis
requirements.description: The system shall include features that support teaching software analysis.

requirements.name: Quality Education on Requirements Traceability
requirements.description: The system shall include features that support teaching requirements traceability.

requirements.name: Visual Examples of Requirements Traceability
requirements.description: The system shall include visual representations of real-world requirements traceability examples.

requirements.name: User-Friendly Tool for Requirements Traceability
requirements.description: The system shall be user-friendly and visually demonstrate the principles of requirements traceability.

requirements.name: Support Common SW Development Models
requirements.description: The system shall support various software development methodologies, including waterfall, iterative-incremental, and agile.

requirements.name: Custom Item Types
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to define custom item types.

requirements.name: Custom User Levels
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to define custom user levels.

requirements.name: Custom Levels for Requirements
requirements.description: The system shall allow users to define levels for requirements, each characterized by a color.

requirements.name: Display Different Versions of Traceability Hierarchy
requirements.description: The system shall manage and display different versions of the traceability hierarchy.

requirements.name: Inform User About Traceability Issues
requirements.description: The system shall provide warnings about potential issues in the traceability hierarchy.

requirements.name: Visual Management of Traceability Hierarchy
requirements.description: The system shall support visual adding, editing, and removing of hierarchy items and their relationships.

requirements.name: Display Traceability Hierarchy
requirements.description: The system shall visually display the traceability hierarchy.

requirements.name: Display Lineage of Hierarchy Item
requirements.description: The system shall enable the user to see the backward and forward lineage of any hierarchy item.

requirements.name: Automatic Derivation of Relationships from Git Commits
requirements.description: The system shall automatically derive relationships from git commits mentioning requirements IDs.

requirements.name: Enforce Item Type Selection
requirements.description: The system shall enforce the selection of an item type for each new hierarchy item.

requirements.name: Enforce User Level Selection
requirements.description: The system shall enforce the selection of a user level for each new requirement.

requirements.name: Support Internal Levels Within User Level Hierarchy
requirements.description: The system shall support defining internal levels within a user level hierarchy.

requirements.name: Arrange Nodes Within Traceability Hierarchy
requirements.description: The system shall enable rearranging nodes in the traceability graph for better visualization.

requirements.name: Create a Project
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to create a project by specifying the project name, repository URL, and access token.

requirements.name: Delete a Project
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to delete an existing project.

requirements.name: Add a New Release to a Project
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to add a new release to an existing project.

requirements.name: Delete a Release from a Project
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to delete an existing release from a project.

requirements.name: View Archived Releases
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to view, but not edit, archived releases.

requirements.name: Add an Item to the Current Project
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to add new items to the current project.

requirements.name: Delete an Item from the Current Project
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to delete items from the current project.

requirements.name: Edit an Item in the Current Project
requirements.description: The system shall enable users to edit items in the current project.

requirements.name: Validate Repository During Project Creation
requirements.description: The system shall validate that the repository URL is valid and accessible with the provided access token.

requirements.name: Validate Relationships to Avoid Cycles
requirements.description: The system shall prevent the creation of relationships that would introduce cycles in the traceability graph.

requirements.name: Validate Status Changes of Items
requirements.description: The system shall enforce specific conditions when changing the status of items.

requirements.name: Validate Item Edits and Provide Warnings
requirements.description: The system shall notify users of potential issues when editing items.

requirements.name: Warn on Editing Requirement with Child Items
requirements.description: The system shall warn users when editing a requirement with child items without updating the child items.

requirements.name: Warn on Changing Status of Requirement with SourceArtifact Children
requirements.description: The system shall warn users when changing the status of a requirement with SourceArtifact children without updating the status of the SourceArtifact items.

requirements.name: Suppress Warnings Option
requirements.description: The system shall provide an option to suppress warnings when editing items or changing their status.

requirements.name: Handle Iterations/Increments
requirements.description: The system shall specify how to handle iterations and increments.

requirements.name: Provide Real-World Examples
requirements.description: The system shall provide real-world examples of requirements traceability in a visual way.

requirements.name: Employ User-Friendly SW Tool
requirements.description: The system shall employ an easy-to-use software tool that demonstrates basic principles of requirements traceability.

relationships.description: Dependencies for custom levels for requirements
Define exact attributes and properties for hierarchy items
Display different versions of traceability hierarchy
Warn on editing requirement with child items
Warn on changing status of requirement with SourceArtifact children
Display Different Versions of Traceability Hierarchy
Support Internal Levels Within User Level Hierarchy
Provide Quality Education on Software Analysis
Provide Quality Education on Requirements Traceability
Provide Visual Examples of Requirements Traceability
